content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0))

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0))

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts iron gear wheels
- Inserters and belts connecting to the furnaces for input/output (positions not specified)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The maximum capacity for items in a furnace is 50. 
- Check the inventory of the furnace before inserting to avoid attempting to insert items when it is full.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure there are enough items in the furnace to extract. If the furnace is empty, extraction will fail.

### General tips
- Always verify the status of entities before performing actions to avoid unnecessary errors.
- Keep track of your inventory and the capacity of your structures to optimize operations.
